author: mlusetti
msg: TAP5-450 Add rel="nofollow" to t:grid sort links

author: castagna
msg: JENA-89 - (slice _ 10 (order (?p ?s) ...)) is optimized to (top (10 ?p ?s) ...) avoiding a total sort. A couple of unit tests have been added to TestOptimizer.java, assuming ORDER BY + LIMIT queries are also tested elsewhere.

author: jukka
msg: JCR-3048: Upgrade to latest Apache parent POM
Revert to an older version of the surefire plugin to avoid some weird concurrent test timing issues.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-2211] add common shared utility code that does things in preparation for leaving the framework and entering user code (annotator calls, flow controller calls), so this can be more easily maintained.  Insure that calls to switchClassLoader are preceded by calls that instantiate a JCas (if the JCas interface is being used), to get the JCas class loaders switched by the switchClassLoaders methods in CASImpl.
Change the release code to first unlock a CAS and then do the "reset".  Update 1 affected test case.

In framework code which prepares to enter user-code, which have "finally" clauses to unlock the CAS etc., skip those if an exception happens early enough in the try block that the CAS was never locked.

author: ningjiang
msg: CXF-3736 Send the cause of exception stack trace
